Description: This elegant Lead-Compliant Colonial with 4 bedrooms , 1 dining room, 1 family room, and fenced yard, has been well maintained. Wooden floor has been through all the bedrooms on 1st and 2nd floor. The basement is a walkout design and w/ laminate floor. The location is very close to Burbank/Chenery schools, playgournd, parks,and public transportations. New dishwasher and newly painted walls, and 7 year old hot water tank. The 5 sets of split air conditioners make summer like winter. Landlord is responsible for mowing the yard. Tenants are responsible for snow removal, gas (heating and cooking) bill, electric bill, and water/sewer bill.
